Using his [[Puppet Technique]], [[Kankurō]] spins [[Karasu]] and [[Kuroari]] around his target at high speed. Karasu launches poison gas bombs at the opponent, surrounding them with a gas cloud. Then both puppets fire a barrage of [[senbon]] from their arms at the now blinded victim.
